{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15726v1", "title": "Barter and Hierarchy: A Practical Perspective on Food, Society, and
  Knowledge in the Inca Empire", "summary": "The Inca Empire developed a sophisticated food production system, social
organisation, and knowledge transmission without money or writing. The article
introduces the concept of a barter economy structured through hierarchical
cooperation and examines the Inca model from a practice-based (heuristical)
perspective.", "main_category": "econ.TH", "categories": "econ.TH", "published": "2025-04-22T09:21:09Z"}
